Develop a specialized diving suit that allows for extended periods of time underwater and increased mobility.
Create a new type of propulsion system that can power submersibles to deeper depths than ever before.
Develop advanced underwater communication technology to allow for real-time communication with the surface team.
Create a new type of underwater robot that can be used to collect samples and data from the deep sea.
Develop a new type of underwater lighting system that can provide bright and clear vision in even the darkest of conditions.
